name: LowDensityLipoprotein
title: Low Density Lipoprotein
description: Note - "This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains laboratory observable term codes for Low Density Lipoprotein (LDL) related codes results in blood including its ratio with High Density Lipoprotein (HDL) and cholesterol.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of blood for LDL.),(Inclusion Criteria: LDL lab test, coded in LOINC, using the source of blood along with HDL and Cholesterol ratio.),(Exclusion Criteria: Does not include any codes or concepts which do not represent LDL as defined in the inclusion criteria.)
